title: High Koalaty Gaming!
body:
http://files.enjin.com/937982/SitePictures/HKG.png

Again our Teamspeak is ts3.highkoalatygaming.org and most everything happens on there!

Also make sure to follow our twitch for shoutcasting, group coaching sessions and all of our koalaty content.

http://www.hitbox.tv/highkoalatygaming

replies.body: This community is Shrektastic!

They received the PixiePoro seal of approval as a Gaming Community

http://i732.photobucket.com/albums/ww323/SKSigs/sealpixie.png
Come register with me in staff assistance!!! I'm really friendly!!!!

This is the best Yu Gi Oh community i have ever see on teamspeck pleas join we have good decks for  you to test your own strong cards against. We have the best new yugioh cards in the worlds so come try us today!

These tournaments have made LoL fun again! I was at the point of quitting due to the ever growing toxic community. But HKG every ones so nice and team oriented it kinda put LoL into a new light for me! =)
Tonight's amazing event: TagPro! SHOW ME WHAT YOU GOT!~
Amazing group of people, glad to be a part of the community :D {{champion:17}}
HKG has really fun tournaments and other fun events!
Tournament for daily 5v5 prized summoner's rift in about 1 hour and 30 mins :D COME JOIN SOON :D
UhhhhhHHHHhhhh

The 5v5 premade tournament that launched today was a rocking success!

We had a lot of fun!! It's going to continue  tomorrow!

If your team missed it this time, come next weekend!

And then stick around for community activities! Ah!!!!!! Come ask me questions in Staff Assistance!
whenever I go to there website  (ts3.highkoalatygaming.org) it says to login, it doesn't let me sign up :( pls help

> [{quoted}](name=mobius1galm16,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=htkE0y1I,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2014-12-15T02:03:29.600+0000)
> whenever I go to there website  (ts3.highkoalatygaming.org) it says to login, it doesn't let me sign up :( pls help

ts3.highkoalatygaming.org is a teamspeak address. Download Teamspeak and click the connect button to connect to our server.

oh ok, how do I download teamspeak?
do I download zpanelcp?

Just go to teamspeak's website and download the client! If you have any ore questions let me know
http://www.teamspeak.com/

thank you for responding. :)
does it cost money to participate is tournaments?
No dear, it is free! :3 If you need more information, connect to our teamspeak at ts3.highkoalatygaming.org and I can help you out :3
Great community =)

Hey *insert name here* have you seen this cool post? It's from HKG, please upvote it and join our community. :){{champion:34}}
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/htkE0y1I-high-koalaty-gaming
I'm in love with the KoKo
You can learn so much from these tournaments! So much RP to BLOW!. The community is extremely friendly... By far the best community i've been in. 11/10 would bang.
Come join us in our Tournaments and have some fun! We're currently updating the Graphic to match our actual Tournament size. We run Four tournaments Simultaneously Separated by solo queue rank!
Just ty for being epic :)
awesome community!
Great place to meet some new friends and have fun playing in tournaments with a chance at winning free RP :)
Ohaii~! I hope you enjoy your stay at HKG!
Best Tourney NA
It is actually 4 tourneys a night! :3 Happy to call this community my home.
bump
HKG such rude they mute me everytime
If Telepath is in it it cant be wrong. {{champion:89}}

I Love the new graphics!
You took the words right out of my mouth with this one! :D
Do you need a mic for the tournaments? Sounds interesting!

> [{quoted}](name=RavenDaze,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=htkE0y1I,comment-id=0021,timestamp=2014-12-16T04:15:11.474+0000)
>
> Do you need a mic for the tournaments? Sounds interesting!

It is technically required in the rules however it is not unknown for cooperative players to be able to pull off using in game pings as their primary form of communication.  These situations vary by team however players who are unable to communicate may be removed from said team as per our rules.  It is required to have an operational microphone to join the community.
Ah, okay. I have a working microphone but I just hate talking on it lol. Thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=RavenDaze,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=htkE0y1I,comment-id=002100000000,timestamp=2014-12-16T05:04:51.529+0000)
>
> Ah, okay. I have a working microphone but I just hate talking on it lol. Thanks!

As long as you communicate well enough and prove you have a microphone you should be fine.
interesting
Fun Loving Community!!!
Great TeamSpeak :D
